items.sentence: Have you already chosen the songs that you\'re going to sing tonight?
Tom and all his friends can easily afford to buy new cars every year.
Tom has been accused of setting fire to one of the buildings he owns.
Tom learned to play the ukulele before he learned to play the guitar.
Tom thought that he was going to be busy all morning, but he wasn\'t.
A few years ago, I wouldn't have thought that this would be possible.
I know that I've met that guy over there, but I don't remember where.
I don't think this is the first time you've seen something like this.
A working man should be paid in proportion to his skill, not his age.
He told me about the accident as if he had seen it with his own eyes.
